Name: Pastey
Overview: A lightweight, self-hosted paste platform (Pastebin alternative) with language detection and on-disk encryption.

PASTEY_RESTRICT_PASTING.Name: PASTEY_RESTRICT_PASTING
PASTEY_RESTRICT_PASTING.Description: Enable/disable restricting of pasting to whitelisted users.

PASTEY_RESTRICT_RAW_PASTING.Name: PASTEY_RESTRICT_RAW_PASTING
PASTEY_RESTRICT_RAW_PASTING.Description: Enable/disable restricting of pasting via /raw to whitelisted users.

PASTEY_RATE_LIMIT.Name: PASTEY_RATE_LIMIT
PASTEY_RATE_LIMIT.Description: Rate limit for pasting, for non-whitelisted users.

PASTEY_RECENT_PASTES.Name: PASTEY_RECENT_PASTES
PASTEY_RECENT_PASTES.Description: Number of recent pastes to show on the home page.

PASTEY_BEHIND_PROXY.Name: PASTEY_BEHIND_PROXY
PASTEY_BEHIND_PROXY.Description: Inform Pastey if it is behind a reverse proxy (nginx, etc.). If this is the case, it will rely on HTTP headers X-Real-IP or X-Forwarded-For. NOTE: Make sure your proxy config sets these values.

PASTEY_USE_WHITELIST.Name: PASTEY_USE_WHITELIST
PASTEY_USE_WHITELIST.Description: Enable/disable whitelisting for admin tasks (view recent, delete, config).

PASTEY_WHITELIST_CIDR.Name: PASTEY_WHITELIST_CIDR
PASTEY_WHITELIST_CIDR.Description: List of whitelisted IP addresses or networks (in CIDR format).

PASTEY_GUESS_THRESHOLD.Name: PASTEY_GUESS_THRESHOLD
PASTEY_GUESS_THRESHOLD.Description: Threshold for automatic language detection guesses. If a result is below this value, it is treated as Plaintext.
